description:
↜Warrior↝
戦士

Hello from the Ethernal. We are working with artist Komiyama Takashi again on a pixel art collection: Ethernal x Hermippe Heroes. This is the fourth in the collection, for those who walk alone into the unknown. The Warrior is equipped with wisdom as their weapon.

Based on the Ethernal hero classes, we are releasing a total of 5 artworks: a new limited artwork every 14 days. Each artwork will have a maximum of 20 art tokens.

Each token comes with: High-resolution JPEG and animated GIF files + Original sketch + Mobile wallpapers. Collect all five tokens to receive special high-resolution JPEG and animated GIF files with all the heroes in portrait and landscape views.

After you purchase the art token, email enter@ethernal.world with the address that owns the token to receive the bundle.
name: ↜Warrior↝
